name: Fund Platform
description:
Crypto market is $250bln. At the same time, 20% of these money are managed by portfolio managers and funds.

Due to the young market, nobody has succeeded at creating the software for professionals in crypto (like interactivebrokers in traditional market)

We are a team of 15 people, that has experience in creating custdev solutions for cryptofunds, that aims to reinvent managing assets industry.

team.name: Nikita Shevchenko
team.bioHtml: Nikita is an entrepreneur with 5 years of experience. He has worked for Google and completed many startup accelerators programs

jobs.title: CTO / Techlead
jobs.description:
Hi, we are the Fund Platform. We make software, thanks to which traders and funds can connect to exchanges and manage their clients' money.
Our developers need a tech lead or a CTO, who will:

-Develop
-Check pool requests (front + back)
-Participate in scheduling tasks
-Interview the developers
-Assign tasks to developers, depending on their skills (3 people)
-Determine the vector of development of the platform and update the infrastructure under modern standards

Our stack:
Vue.Js, Typescript
Node.js
Docker-compose
Cloudflare, Jira, Bitbucket
OOP, DDD

What do we offer:
Equity (company is valuated at $1,800k
Career growth
Remote work, smooth morning
Volume of tasks for 40 hours a week, or you can take more
